Text: The Adelaide Glaciarium (also known as Ice Palace Skating Rink) was the first indoor ice skating facility built in Australia.
Triplets:<The Adelaide Glaciarium
1:
--------------------
Text: Adelaide Glaciarium:  This is the birthplace for ice skating in Australia and is the location of the first hockey on the ice match in the country, which was an adaptation of roller polo for the ice using ice skates.
Triplets:<Adelaide Glaciarium
2:
--------------------
<Text: Adelaide Glaciarium:  Contemporary ice hockey was never played at this venue but this ice skating rink, the country's first, provided the "test bed" facility for its successor the Melbourne Glaciarium, the birthplace of ice hockey in Australia.>

Triplets:<Adelaide Glaciarium
